title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing an earthquake in a dream

preview.html: What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of an earthquake in a dream? Interpretation of an earthquake in a dream It is not very promising in all translation books, especially if the place or city is completely destroyed, and there are some rare and benign cases in this dream that you will learn about through the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you You are waiting for him.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing an earthquake in a dream. The interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi is divided into four main signs, which are as follows: Or not: If the dreamer sees an earthquake that completely destroys the house and all of his possessions are exposed to everyone, here the earthquake is interpreted with many secrets and mysteries about life. The dreamer that people will know and harm will happen to him, because bad secrets can be revealed about him and make everyone turn away from him. Second: When an earthquake appears in a dream, and all the villagers are screaming and screaming to get out of this disaster safely, this symbolizes the cruelty of the ruler and the injustice of his subjects, so that he makes them feel Anxious and uneasy. He always feels disturbed and threatened by his mistreatment of them. Third: When a sick person dreams of an earthquake, he dies and a dreamer who is physically and psychologically healthy, when he dreams of a strong earthquake, suffers from a disease that robs him of his strength and stagnates at home. Fourth: When the dreamer witnesses a series of terrible natural disasters. Such as earthquakes and volcanoes, and seeing the sky raining fire or poisonous insects, all of these witnesses confirm God’s extreme wrath on the people of the place and He will punish them. In a horrific way. Seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin When the dreamer dreams in a dream that one of the walls of the house has fallen as a result of the violence of the earthquake, the vision indicates the death of an important person in the house and it may be the father or mother. Ibn Sirin said that the earthquake is an evil symbol and is interpreted as strife and behavior. The bad that the people of the place affected by the earthquake continue to do in a dream, such as committing adultery, murder, or theft. If the dreamer is standing in the desert or a deserted place where no humans dream, and he sees that the earthquake seriously struck that place, then the dream here is benign and is one of the cases Rare earthquakes that indicate a change in this place for the better. The desert can be reclaimed and cultivated, and many plants will grow in it, and the place devoid of people will be inhabited and inhabited by people. An earthquake can awaken memories that the dreamer intends to forget, but he will remember them because of some situations that he will be exposed to soon, and perhaps... The conversation again on topics that have been closed for some time. An earthquake in a traveler’s dream is a sign of his great fear of leaving his country, and therefore he will live under threat and feel fear and instability in the country he is traveling to. All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of an earthquake in a dream. Seeing an earthquake in a dream For a single woman, when a girl dreams of an earthquake, she is nervous and thinks a lot about her career or the future of school. If the earthquake was violent in the dream and because of the difficulty of the situation, the dreamer kept screaming and looking for a safe place to hide and woke up from it in fear and her psychological state was

title: Interpretation of running away from someone I know in a dream

preview.html: Escaping from a person known to you Seeing someone you know chasing you Meaning of escaping from a known person If you see in your dream that someone you know is chasing you and wants to harm you, this means that you will confront this person. It is putting pressure on you, so know that you will fall into a dilemma and it is necessary to be careful and cautious. What does it mean to chase someone who is running away from you in a dream? This dream symbolizes your desire to give up a certain matter that occupies you in reality, and it indicates that you are running away from some feelings that worry you, such as Fear and tension that arise from the worries and obstacles that control you in your life. Therefore, your will to get rid of those things that weigh you down is embodied in the dream of being chased. What if you are the person who was chased in the dream? This dream suggests escaping from an idea that terrifies you in reality, or that you are avoiding a problem because you are afraid to face it or accept it in your normal life. This may indicate The vision indicates your denial of some bad aspects of your personality and indifference to the annoying actions and gossip that you did previously. If you see that the stalker is one of your colleagues, this means that he is trying to get your own position or that he is looking for high positions at work. If you dream that the stalker approached you and almost caught If you dream that someone you know is chasing you, this indicates that the real problem that scares you will disappear only in confrontation. If you dream that someone you know is chasing you, this means that you are living in an obsession that this person will reveal your personal affairs in reality. This dream may indicate the person’s desire to attract you Hunting also comes in the context of envy by others. Interpretation of a dream about escape - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about greeting and shaking hands in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of greeting and shaking hands for an unmarried woman, and shaking hands with someone I know if the deceased is alive, and refusing a young man to shake hands with a girl, and kissing, and not returning the greeting to a married, pregnant woman. According to Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees in his dream that he is shaking hands or greeting someone, as there is no enmity or enmity between him and the dreamer in reality, then the dream indicates the joy and happiness that the latter finds in reality. If there is enmity or enmity between these two people in reality, then The dream in this case shows the dreamer’s ability to protect himself from the harm that this person causes to the dreamer in real life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is shaking hands or greeting a cleric or sheikh that he does not know, then this dream is good news and an indication of the safety and security that the dreamer enjoys next to his Lord. If this sheikh or cleric whom the dreamer received in the dream and shook hands with him was known to him, then the dream at that time indicates the marriage of this dreamer to a beautiful woman of high character and morals. It is also said that this dream indicates the bliss that the dreamer finds in earthly and blue life. With many different types of fruits. Whoever shakes hands with a young man unknown to him and greets him in a dream, the dream shows salvation from the evil of competitors and enemies. As for whoever sees in his dream that he shakes hands with an enemy or greets someone between him and that person, there is competition in reality, then the dream shows the end of hostility and the resolution of disputes. Between them and the hostility between them turned into love and respect. In the event that the dreamer sees that an opponent or enemy has come and quickly shakes hands with the fortuneteller and welcomes him, the dream shows the intention of this opponent or enemy in reality, which indicates this person’s desire. To seek to end and resolve differences and end the hatred that existed between them and transform them into love and brotherhood. Whoever sees in his dream that he is shaking hands with someone and working with him in trade, the dream indicates the good conduct of this trade and business between these two people in reality. Whoever sees that he greets a person in a dream There was no enmity or enmity between them. The Muslim with him brings joy, security and kindness from the Muslim. If he is a well-known old man, then he acquires many plants and fruits. If the Muslim is an unknown young man, then he will rid himself of his enemy. If the Muslim wants to propose to a man who responds, then he will marry the one who Answer me. He proposes to her. If he does not answer him, he will not marry him, and if the trade between them takes place and he greets him and there is a response, then his answer is that this trade reconciles between them, and if he does not answer. This, they will not be reconciled and will not be complete. If he sees that he has greeted an unknown person, accepts it, then greets him, responds to him, and will be rewarded for it. And it was said: And whoever sees that he has greeted a broken person. Whoever dreams of shaking hands with someone he is accustomed to, greets him and embraces him, then this is good. And it shows the kind words that he hears and says. And if he sees that he shakes hands with an enemy and embraces him, this indicates that his enmity will disappear. Whoever dreams that angels greet them, peace be upon them, God will grant him insight and good fortune. Greeting in a dream indicates a Muslim’s surrender to him, and the greeting may indicate the need for someone to respond. To him. And when

title: Interpretation of offering lettuce in a dream to Ibn Sirin for good and evil

preview.html: The interpretation of presenting lettuce in a dream is one of the visions that people search for a lot, as it appears in the dream a lot very often. Make it one of the basic foods and vegetables on the table in the holy month of Ramadan. The fortune teller or the fortune teller may see himself giving a person lettuce in a dream, and the person may also give it to him, whether he is known or unknown, but this person may be dead, and he takes lettuce from the living or gives it to him, and each of these two cases has its own interpretation, as well as to know his purchase and cutting it, and therefore we present to you in the following paragraphs the most important interpretation of lettuce in a dream through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of presenting lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin The following is the interpretation of seeing lettuce and giving it in a dream as narrated by Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing lettuce in a dream generally means money and a lot of nutrition, especially if it is fresh with green leaves that are not yellow or wilted. Giving a stranger lettuce leaves to the dreamer means that he will earn a lot of money from his trade or work, while seeing him eat it indicates the blessing of health, body and longevity by the command of God. Ibn Sirin believes that planting lettuce inside the dreamer's house was growing and bearing fruit, it is a sign of the happiness and prosperity that he and his children enjoy. Giving lettuce in a dream to someone unknown to him symbolizes that the dreamer A generous person with a good personality who will help the needy, and God Almighty will reward him for that with the best reward. The seer’s lettuce crop is inside his house, and it was slow to grow, then it grew and its flowers opened, indicating that he will go through a financial crisis, but it will soon end and his pain will be resolved with comfort and nourishment. And God Almighty knows best. And among the sayings of seeing lettuce in a dream is that it may indicate a ruptured uterus or a quarrel between friends. Seeing yourself eating lettuce may mean that the viewer will be exposed to a health problem as a result of malnutrition, especially if the lettuce is black. Interpretation of lettuce leaves in a dream Seeing lettuce leaves in a dream has specific interpretations and connotations that differ according to the social and psychological state of the viewer, which are as follows: Seeing lettuce leaves in a dream indicates what the dreamer will soon earn from food and money, while if the dreamer suffers from sadness or suffering, it is good news about the end of anxiety and anxiety from his life and that he will enjoy happiness and stability. Lettuce leaves in a dream show what the fortune teller will hear in the coming period of news that will make him happy and joyful, and it may also promise good news that God Almighty will respond to the fortune teller’s prayer that he insisted on a lot. Seeing wilted or yellow lettuce leaves in a dream indicates the sad news that the dreamer hears or the illness that will pass, but God Almighty will heal him soon. Picking lettuce in a dream Seeing someone picking lettuce in a dream indicates excellence and success academically and practically, in addition to Achieving the goals that the dreamer has set in an attempt to achieve. The wilted yellow lettuce, which the dreamer picked in a dream, indicates a project or money that is not good in it. Picking rotten lettuce symbolizes the harm that the dreamer will suffer from or a problem at work and

title: Interpretation of a dream about a plane crashing in front of me and different interpretations related to this vision

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a plane falling in front of me Many people dream of dreams that they think are frightening to interpret because they are frightening in reality and end in many disasters as a person wants. Interpretation of dreams of a plane falling in front of me One of the great commentators. The dream of flying in general is one of the dreams that indicate positive feelings and a sense of freedom, and the dream of a plane is one of the common dreams, but the dream of a plane and its crash is one of the dreams that are not widespread and will be interpreted by all interpreters. Interpretation of a dream of a plane falling in front of me by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of dreams of a plane falling in front of me Many people feel the need to explain all their visions, so the site is different Interpretation of a bouquet of visions and interpretation of the plane crash in front of the insight is: Whoever sees in a dream that there is a dispute between him and a person in the plane that led to its crash, it means that there is a struggle between good and evil in Istikhara. Someone says that they want thatInterpretation of dreams of a plane falling in front of me He was completely destroyed because Ibn Sirin explained to him that this indicates that there are many events in his life that will change for the better. If the owner of the vision sees the plane exploding in a dream, this is evidence of failure in an important matter that concerns him and he undertakes to do Currently. The interpretation of a dream about an airplane in a dream indicates the presence of many positive things, as it shows a mirror of successful issues and things in one's life in reality. Seeing a person in a dream means that he is in a plane that is already flying in the sky and there is someone trying to shoot him down, this indicates a psychological battle within the dreamer between good and evil in his life and in his dreams. Also, seeing an attempt to shoot down a plane that you are on and flying it means that there are people in your life who are trying to sabotage your plans and successes and you must be careful of them. If the dreamer sees a plane falling and crashing in front of his eyes in a dream, this may indicate a change in his life with plans and successes. If a woman sees that she is flying a plane but it crashes, this is a sign of a big problem in her life, but she will get rid of it and will be able to overcome it. Seeing a person that he is in a plane, but it falls, is a sign of insight and a message that he is making many wrong decisions in his life and needs care. Seeing the same person driving a plane is a sign that he is achieving his dreams and goals. Seeing someone driving a plane in a dream means that he will reach a high position in a great and important position. If an unmarried woman sees a plane taking off in her dream, this is evidence of Her superiority and she will have a lot of living and money, and this indicates her great influence and attractiveness. Seeing a pregnant woman on a plane is a sign of the safety of her fetus and her imminent birth date. An unmarried girl who sees a plane in a dream indicates that she will marry or be engaged soon. Interpretation of a dream of a plane crash in front of me by Al-Nabulsi He interprets the vision of a person who sees that one of his relatives or someone he knows is dear to him on a plane and fell in a dream, as this is evidence of this person being exposed to many problems and crises that hinder him in his travels. title: Interpretation of losing a ring in a dream I lost my ring in a dream

preview.html: A dream that I lost a ring from a single girl, to a married woman, to a pregnant woman, to a divorced woman, to a man, whether I saw the ring missing, gold, silver, the ring was lost, then I found it, I dreamed that the engagement ring and the wedding ring of Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi were lost and not only. The ring is considered an important accessory For women, it is necessary for every woman, and it is a means of decoration and beautification. Rings in a dream. Interpretation of losing a ring in a dream. Whoever sees that he has lost his ring in a dream, it is a loss of honor, influence, and prestige, because the ring is power and strength, and losing it is a loss for them. Losing a ring in a dream is evidence of your expulsion. From work. Losing or falling from a ring in a dream indicates the death of a son. Losing a girl’s ring in a dream is evidence that her fiancé will break up with her because of her bad mood. Seeing a married woman losing a silver ring in a dream means that she will separate from her husband. Losing a silver ring in A man’s dream is evidence of the death of a loved one. Losing an engagement ring in a dream indicates problems that the dreamer will face. Losing the fiancé’s engagement ring, but searching for it in the dream, is evidence of the great happiness that he will have in the near future. Losing the engagement ring of his fiancée is In a dream, it is evidence of a difficult situation that the dreamer is going through. Losing an engagement ring in a dream is evidence of problems that the dreamer will face and some bad things that he must reject. Losing a gold wedding ring in a dream is evidence of big problems that will arise. Seeing the ring stolen or missing In a dream, it symbolizes disagreements between her and her husband, leading to separation. As for the evil of what was said about silver, seeing silver broken, stolen, or lost is considered an unpleasant vision, because it indicates that bad things will happen to the girl, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a ring in a dream: a vision A golden ring in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s problems and delusions. Also, seeing a ring made of wood, iron, or copper symbolizes bad luck and is one of the unpleasant visions. As for seeing a silver ring, it symbolizes the positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions. Seeing a ring in a dream symbolizes kindness and is one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams. Finding a ring in a dream or receiving it as a gift symbolizes the wife’s marriage or pregnancy, which is a good thing, God willing. As for breaking the ring and losing it, there is no good in it. Seeing yourself changing position A ring from one finger to another in a dream is not a good thing. Also, removing the ring from the finger of a spouse or fiancé symbolizes the end of interconnected relationships. The lobe of a ring symbolizes the dreamer’s children, money, kindness, and strength. Selling a ring or breaking it symbolizes divorce or the end of relationships. Swallowing a ring symbolizes the dreamer falling into many problems. The ring melting after being exposed to fire is good for the dreamer and portends positive changes in his life. The dreamer who was beaten by someone with a ring symbolizes gaining a living. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl receiving a ring like this

title: Interpretation of seeing grilled chicken in a dream. Seeing grilled chicken in a dream

preview.html: Seeing grilled chicken for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, married or single, whether buying from the market, restaurant, preparing, eating, eating, cooking, grilled chicken in Kentucky by Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a dream about grilled chicken according to Ibn Sirin. Grilled chicken indicates that she will hear Disturbing news, and a married woman who sees in her dream that she is eating grilled chicken, will be distracted by her household affairs. Interpretation of seeing cooked chicken in a dream? Seeing cooked chicken in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be freed from his debts and also foretells a financial improvement and benefiting from new income. This dream also indicates the stability that she will enjoy with her family and husband. As for a pregnant woman, seeing cooked chicken in her dream is a symbol of her pregnancy with a male child. As for a single woman, this dream is evidence of her close relationship with a financially capable man. How can a dream of grilled chicken be interpreted? If you see grilled chicken in general in a dream, this It foretells that you will receive bad and disturbing news. Eating grilled and roasted chicken in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will earn money and great material gains, but its source remains unknown and suspicious, which may get him into trouble with the law. Marriage and material gains The most prominent meanings of a dream about cooked chicken, if it is a married woman She eats grilled chicken in her dream, this is evidence of her husband’s neglect and lack of interest in the affairs of her home and family. Interpretation of seeing grilled chicken in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a grilled chicken in one dream expresses the desire to achieve some goals or achieve some goals such as marriage, possessions, and living. If an unmarried woman sees people Those around her, gathering around the table, eating fried chicken without being able to take it with them, this indicates many difficulties that she may face, especially in the practical or family field. We have talked in previous topics about the importance of chicken in general in visions, and we have mentioned in Several articles say that chicken meat in the interpretation is food or money, while grilled chicken is an expression of desires and wishes... Goodness is dreams to see for single people, such as buying or eating it because it contains a scene from a dream, an expression of reaching a goal and achieving an end. Interpretation of eating grilled chicken in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman or girl in general sees in her dream that she is eating grilled chicken meat, then this interpretation is very good and expresses an imminent fulfillment of the desire, especially if she finds that it tastes delicious. And delicious. On the verge of achieving that security. But if the unmarried girl’s desire is related to success in study or work and she sees in her dream that she is eating a grilled chicken, then by the grace of God she can achieve what she desires, especially if she sees that she is eating breasts and hips, as in the dream. She does not like to see the girl. You eat a chicken neck, whether it is fried, cooked, or grilled. Interpretation of a dream about grilled chicken in a married woman’s dream. Grilled chicken in a married woman’s dream has many interpretations. Sometimes it represents money and sometimes it represents money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bicycle

preview.html: A bicycle in a dream. A bicycle is considered a means of exercise and fun, and when you see it in a dream, it reflects other things and has many different interpretations. A woman we know today through this article. A bicycle in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees in her dream riding a bicycle, her vision expresses her effort to reach What she wants to achieve. His vision also shows the nourishment coming to him. Falling off a bike in a dream for one person indicates the emergence of problems and crises in her life. As for seeing the bike in red, this means that he is going through a state of happiness. It can also express the approach of her marriage and her feeling of stability. In her life. A bicycle for a single girl expresses her success. If she is riding on an unpaved road, but rather has obstacles, then her vision indicates crises and problems that she faces in her life. A light-colored bicycle expresses a future life full of optimism and kindness for the girl. If it appears in the color Dark, this indicates that there are difficulties on his way. If a girl is engaged and dreams that she falls while riding a bike, this indicates that there will be problems with her fiancé. A bicycle in a dream for a married woman. In a dream for a married woman, seeing that she is riding a bicycle and walking easily, expresses a state of affairs The calm and stability she experiences in her life with her husband. But if she cannot walk, then her vision reflects the difficulties she faces on this path and the crises she experiences on her way. And when you see her riding a bike and cannot walk on it and she is afraid of the road and bumps, then her vision indicates the presence of many problems and disagreements. Between her and her husband. And if she sees that she fell more than once while riding a bike, then her vision expresses the wrong path she is taking in life and she needs to think twice. Interpretation of cycling in a dream: In a bachelor’s dream, seeing him riding a bike indicates that he achieved what he was looking for. If he is riding a bike with a woman in a dream, his vision indicates that his marriage is approaching. Riding a bike at a high speed shows hasty and careless decision making. Riding a yellow bike indicates the pressure and tension that the viewer feels. Riding a red bike in a bachelor’s dream expresses the emotional state he is going through And when a man dreams that he is riding a bicycle, his vision expresses stability and peace in his life if he rides it with confidence and calm. And when a man dreams that he is riding a bicycle, his vision expresses stability and peace in his life if he rides it with confidence and calm. Riding a bike with another person, seeing him also expresses happiness and stability, if this person knows him. As for seeing falling from the bike, it expresses the emergence of crises and problems in the dreamer’s life. Riding a bike in a dream with a relative or friend of the viewer expresses the changes that are occurring in the life of the dreamer. The dreamer is for a better and better condition. Buying a bike in a dream. Seeing buying a bike in the dreamer’s dream expresses his ability to overcome the problems and obstacles he faces. And that the monarch will overcome these difficulties and begin a new phase in his life. In a dream
